meanings.definition: Wooden panels lining the lower part of a room's walls.
meanings.sent1: The wainscotings in the dining room added a cozy touch to the decor.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter installed the wainscotings in the hallway last week.
meanings.sent3: As the wainscotings whispered to each other, the walls felt warmer.
meanings.sent4: The wainscotings stood like loyal guards protecting the room's walls.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight danced on the wainscotings, creating a beautiful pattern on the floor.

meanings.definition: The act of installing wooden panels on the walls of a room.
meanings.sent1: The wainscotings of the library were completed by the skilled craftsmen.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of wainscotings and transformed her living room.
meanings.sent3: The wainscotings installation turned into a fun family project over the weekend.
meanings.sent4: The wainscotings seemed to embrace the room, making it feel complete.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammers echoed through the house as the wainscotings were put up.
